articles.description: Could the shot actually improve long COVID symptoms? What can you expect after getting a vaccine? Here's what experts say.
articles.content: Michelle Chason, a reiki master in Tallahassee, Florida, was diagnosed with COVID-19 on June 15, 2020. First, she developed dry mouth. Then came the nasty vertigo spells that led to spinning rooms an… [+4899 chars]

articles.title: Texas woman among thousands of COVID-19 survivors struggling with ‘mystery’ long-haul symptoms - KSAT San Antonio
articles.description: On the pandemic's first anniversary, some COVID-19 survivors are still struggling with puzzling symptoms.
articles.content: There was no reason to celebrate on Rachel Van Lears anniversary. The same day a global pandemic was declared, she developed symptoms of COVID-19. A year later, shes still waiting for them to disappe… [+7129 chars]

articles.title: Which providers will get COVID-19 vaccine doses this week - KXAN.com
articles.description: Overall, Central Texas got 66,950 first doses of the COVID-19 vaccine the week of March 15. That’s down from 91,190 doses last week.
